title: Red Dwarf - Better Than Life (Audio book)

Author: Rob Grant & Doug Naylor
Author: Rob Grant & Doug Naylor
Read by: Chris Barrie (aka Rimmer)


LISTER IS LOST

Three Million years from Earth he&#039;s marooned in a world createdby his own psyche. For Lister it&#039;s the most dangerous place hecould possibly be because he is completely happy.

Rimmer has a problem too. He&#039;s dead. But that&#039;s not the problem.Rimmer&#039;s problem is he&#039;s trapped in a landscape created by his own subconscious. And Rimmer&#039;s subconscious doesn&#039;t like him one little bit.

Together with Cat, the-best dressed entity in all six knowuniverses, and Kryten, a sanitation Mechanoid with a missingsanity chip, they are trapped in the ultimate computer game:Better Than Life. The zenith of computer game technology, BTLtransports you directly to a perfect world of your imagination, aworld where you can enjoy fabulous wealth and unmitigatedsuccess.

It&#039;s the ideal game with only one drawback - it&#039;s so good, it will kill you.
